getDuration

public static java.lang.String getDuration(long startTime,
                                           long endTime)
Returns a string reporting the time passed between startTime and endTime, both given in milliseconds, in hours, minutes, seconds and milliseconds

Parameters:
startTime - The start time in milliseconds
endTime - The end time in milliseconds
Returns:
A human readable representation of a timespan given in milliseconds
